description:
A private counseling that should have never seen the light of day ended up being recorded and found by a certain instigator. Using this footage as blackmail he begins his corruption of the busty physical education teacher.
Source: hanime

titles.title: Kaho Ootani, une éducatrice physique au service de la folie
The Sexy Spats Female Teacher: Kaho - A Snuggling and Pissing Nymphomaniac
エロスパ女教師・歌穂~寄り添い溢れる婢狂♥
